sense.def:
To remind someone about a fact or event
pomeni, da namerno rečemo nekaj, zaradi česar človek pomisli na dejstvo ali dogodek, ki ga že pozna.

seg.quote: She had to remind him that he had a wife.
Miss Lemon reminded him of two appointments.
Remind me to speak to you about Davis.

sense.def:
To remind someone of another person or thing
pomeni, da je nekdo ali nekaj tako podobno neki drugi osebi ali stvari, da pomislimo na tisto drugo osebo ali stvar.

seg.quote: Your son reminds me of you at his age.
